question: You are going away to travel for the summer. A friend will be looking after your house while you are away. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:say where you are going,describe your homeexplain some of the things your friend must do to look after your house.Write at least 150 words.You do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear ___,
text: I hope you doing great. By the way, did you remember the fantastic news I told you the other week when we were having wine and steak at your place? Actually, because of my amazing performance this past few months at work, my boss rewarded me with  a trip to Korea this summer. And ,definitely I'm not gonna pass this opportunity to take some time off from work.

I was hoping  you could look for my house for the time being. Well, it's not really quite that hard to look after my house. It's just an 85 sqm home with a small backyard. You could also enjoy my tiny swimming pool with Jude while I am away.  I just need you to water my plants and feed my dog, of ,course you know my dog "Kimchi".

Moreover, please do some light cleaning if you have some spare time. I would really appreciate it. Just kidding. You have nothing to worry about cleaning my house, I will just call the cleaning agency about that. I'll be gone for just 7-9 days.
Thank you so much. Just let me know if you make it happen. Please?

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase definitely. Consider adding a comma.
It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
